entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlo 10:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -23.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -28.3°C
Wind: W 45 km/h gust 79 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along the Bay of Chaleur coast. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23 except minus 30 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 23 except minus 30 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 10.
